segments.text: excuse me ? How can I get to the nearest branch of the national bank ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: there ’ s branch on new street . Walk up this street until you get to the first set of traffic lights . Then turn right at the traffic lights .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: how far up the street are the traffic lights ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: ok . So I turn right at the traffic lights . Then ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: then keep walking until you reach the war memorial . It ’ s a big statue of a soldier . You can ’ t miss it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: ok . Where do I go then ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: you ’ ll see the national bank near the war memorial . It ’ s a big building and you ’ ll see a big sign on the front of the building .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: got it . Thank you very much .
segments.speaker: S1
